HotelElement.Name: Solent Hotel & Spa Fareham - Part of the Shire Hotels Group

Description.Text: Whether you love getting out and about by the coast with the family, or want to enjoy a lazy weekend of Spa treatments and good food with friends, the Solent is sure to fit the bill. It's nestled in mature woods and ancient meadowland, so when you're there you feel like you're miles away from anywhere. Yet it's perfectly located between the coastal cities of Southampton and Portsmouth. Will it be sailing, country walks, maritime history and sightseeing or a few days of pure indulgence? If your idea of a great weekend is staying put and enjoying the surroundings, that's just fine too. With complimentary spa facilities during your stay youre sure to return home feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Hotel take your comfort and well-being very seriously - but it doesnt mean hotel dont want you to enjoy yourself at the same time. Which is why you have complimentary membership of the Spa during your stay with the hotel. Run, step or stretch those muscles with a pulse-pumping workout in the well-equipped gym. But if endorphin rushes arent for you, you can always retreat to the whirlpool or steam room - a much gentler way to refresh your mind and body. When it comes to the food - hotel prefer not to go the extra mile. Chef, Peter Williams, sources local produce wherever possible to ensure hotel feature the best of the area on the menus. Plus, there's also The Parson's Collar - the very own Thwaites country pub on site - and all-day dining in the lounge and bar.

At J9 of the M27, midpoint between Southampton and Portsmouth, there's plenty to see and do in around the hotel itself. But should you wish to spread your wings, what about a trip to see the New Forest's wild ponies, or visit the Historic Dockyard and Spinnaker Tower? There's races at Glorious Goodwood. Or why not take a ferry to the Isle of Wight for the day?

DOUBLE - ROOM - Fresh milk - delivered daily to every room. Hotel know it's only a little thing - but it's one that everyone appreciates. You'll find your guest room has lots of these thoughtful touches - like complimentary mineral water, fresh ground coffee & a great tea selection, free WiFi internet access and a complimentary newspaper. And it goes without saying, a stylish, contemporary decor and a great bed for a good night's sleep.
EXECUTIVE - DOUBLE - All of the Executive rooms include the following facilities: Work desk with good lighting and power points, Seperate seating area with coffee table and sofa/easy chair, Guest fridge with complimentary mineral water and fresh milk, Satellite colour television, Radio or TV alarm clock, Hairdryer, Trouser press, Direct dial telephone, WiFi internet access - free of charge to all hotel residents, Tea and coffee making facilities, Air conditioning, En suite bathroom with complimentary Pecksniffs toiletries and Luxury bathrobes.
FAMILY - EXECUTIVE - Choose between a room with double bed and bunk beds (for children under the age of 12) or a room with a double bed and double sofa bed. Family executive rooms include the following facilities: En-suite bathroom, Gilchrist Soames spa products, Flat screen satellite television, DVD player, Radio alarm clock, Hairdryer, Trouser press, Tea and coffee making facilities, Direct dial telephone, WiFi Internet access - free of charge to all hotel residents, Guest fridge with complimentary mineral water and fresh milk, Bathrobe, Shaver socket in the bathroom, Air conditioning, Electricity: 240 volts. Plus hotel also have a choice of children's DVD's to watch including Madagascar, the Harry Potter series, Shrek, Happy Feet, Over the Hedge and Robots. Please ask at reception for more details.
